name: Sweet Baby Soap
description:
Our baby soap is made with extra moisturizing ingredients for little one's delicate skin.  It contains 15% Olive Oil and 5% Shea Butter. 
The scent is soft, sweet and just amazingly kissable. It starts out with top notes of Lavender, Chamomile and a bit of Orange and Eucalyptus. The blend is rounded out with Cedarwood, Musk and Hay, making it absolutely precious smelling.

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Soybean Oil,  Olive Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Shea Butter and Castor Oil, Fragrance Oil, Lavender Essential Oil, Kaolin Clay

Our bars are large and oversized to last, each bar is approximately 5.5 oz.  Our soap is handcrafted by the individual batch. Color will vary from batch to batch.

To make your soap last longer, be sure to store it in a well draining soap dish and away from the direct  stream of water in your bath.

name: Shampooch
description:
Soap for our four paw companions - this is also a GREAT hiker's soap.  It contains the same blend of oils as our Shampoo bar but it has less castor oil making a less frothy soap so it's easier to rinse from your doggie's fur.  We also used essential oils that are known for their insect repelling properties and are good for skin such as patchouli and tea tree oil. 

Ingredients:  Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Castor Oil, Sunflower Oil, Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Jojoba Oil,  Cocoa Butter and Essential Oils of Tea Tree, Lavender, Cedarwood and Patchouli    

For best results:  Wet fur and shampoo bar.  Glide shampoo bar down length of coat 3-4 times.  Work into a lather and rinse thoroughly.  Keep Shampoo Bar dry between uses.  Avoid contact with eyes.

name: Rosemary & Tea Tree Shampoo Bar
description:
Our Shampoo Bar is Sodium Laurel Sulfate free - meaning our shampoo bar is gentile and will not strip your hair of its natural moisturizers.  It also contains a lovely blend of Rosemary, Tea Tree and Peppermint Oil to liven up your scalp. 

For Best Results: Wet both hair and the shampoo bar. Glide the shampoo bar down the length of your hair about three times (right, left and back). Work into a lather and rinse thoroughly.  Follow with conditioner if desired. 

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Castor Oil, Sunflower Oil, Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Jojoba Oil,  Cocoa Butter and Essential Oils of Rosemary, Tea Tree and Peppermint

name: Soapy Joe
description:
A good cup of coffee is usually associated with helping folks to wake up in the morning but it can also help to perk up your skin.  Caffeinated Skincare products are the newest craze to hit the skincare market - caffeine has anti-inflamatory properties which makes it ideal for reducing redness and inflammation.  We started this soap with a really strong pot of coffee and blended the scent with rich chocolate.  

Decadent and Rich

Ingredients:  Coffee brewed from distilled water, Saponified oils of Coconut, Palm, Soybean, Sweet Almond, Olive and Castor, Fragrance Oil, Kaolin Clay and Ground Coffee Beans.

name: Pleasantly Pumpkin
description:
Ingredients: Distilled Water, Saponified Oils of Coconut, Palm, Soybean, Sweet Almond, Olive and Castor, Pumpkin Puree, Fragrance Oil, Kaolin Clay.

Our bars are large and over-sized to last, each bar is approximately 5.5 oz. Our soap is handcrafted by the individual batch. Color will vary from batch to batch.

To make your soap last even longer be sure to store them in a well draining soap dish and away from the direct stream of water in your bath.

name: Wicked Raspberry
description:
Black Raspberry Vanilla is decadent with fruity notes to create a sublime scent. Fresh, vine-ripened raspberries and blackberry notes are mixed with Italian Bergamot, California Barlett pear and softened with notes of plum wine, vanilla orchid and a silky, cashmere musk. 

Wicked sweet, silky and mouth-watering. 

Ingredients:  Distilled Water, Saponified Oils of Coconut, Palm, Soybean, Sweet Almond, Olive and Castor, Fragrance Oil, Kaolin Clay. 

Our bars are large and over-sized to last, each bar is approximately 5.5 oz.  Our soap is handcrafted by the individual batch. Color will vary from batch to batch.

To make your soap last even longer be sure to store them in a well draining soap dish and away from the direct stream of water in your bath.

name: Honey Bear Oatmeal
description:
A favorite of the locals.  This is the perfect melding of the three fabulous scents of Oatmeal, Milk, and Honey.  Sweet and toasty, this is one soap that you'll want to take a bite out of! 

Ingredients:  Distilled Water, Saponified Oils of Coconut, Palm, Canola, Sweet Almond, Olive and Castor, Fragrance Oil, Ground Oatmeal, Kaolin Clay. 

Our bars are large and oversized to last, each bar is approximately 5.5 oz.  Our soap is handcrafted by the individual batch. Color will vary from batch to batch.

To make your Black Bear Soap last even longer be sure to store them in a well draining soap dish and away from the direct stream of water in your bath.

name: Rum & Cinnamon-Mon
description:
This fragrance is all about exotic spices - Allspice, Capers, Cloves, Nutmeg and mix with Crushed Orange, Crisp Pine Needles and just a touch of Patchouli and Vanilla to add a deep base note for staying powder. This soap’s beautiful rich brownish red color comes from natural cinnamon; the added cinnamon also adds a fantastic exfoliation to this soap leaving you softer, cleaner and more radiant. 

Ingredients:  Distilled Water, Saponified Oils of Coconut, Palm, Canola, Sweet Almond, Olive and Castor, Fragrance Oil, Cinnamon, Kaolin Clay. 
 
Our bars are large and over-sized to last, each bar is approximately 5.5 oz.  Our soap is handcrafted by the individual batch. Color will vary from batch to batch.

To make your Black Bear Soap last even longer be sure to store them in a well draining soap dish and away from the direct stream of water in your bath.

name: Positively Patchouli
description:
This lovely Patchouli Essential Oil Soap is exquisite.  The scent is earthy and deep with a hint of citrus. 

Ingredients:  Distilled Water, Saponified Oils of Coconut, Palm, Canola, Hemp seed, Olive and Castor, Essential Oils of Patchouli and Orange

Our bars are large and over-sized to last, each bar is approximately 5.5 oz.  Our soap is handcrafted by the individual batch. Color will vary from batch to batch.

To make your soap last even longer be sure to store them in a well draining soap dish and away from the direct stream of water in your bath.

name: Starry Night
description:
Starry Night's elusive and deeply sensual blend is comprised of: Patchouli Oil, Orange Oil, Lavendin Oil, Pine Oil, Lemongrass Oil, Elemi Oil and Gardenia Extract. 

Ingredients:  Distilled Water, Saponified Oils of Coconut, Palm, Canola, Hempseed, Olive and Castor, Essential Oils of Patchouli, Orange, Lavendin, Pine, Lemongrass, Elemi and Gardenia, Kaolin Clay

Our bars are large and oversized to last, each bar is approximately 5.5 oz.  Our soap is handcrafted by the individual batch. Color will vary from batch to batch.

To make your soap last even longer be sure to store them in a well draining soap dish and away from the direct stream of water in your bath.

name: Ladies Love Lavender
description:
Lavender is said to ease a tired mind and increase feelings of relaxation and well being.  What a perfect way to begin or end your day with this lovely lavender soap in your shower. 

Ingredients:  Distilled Water, Saponified Oils of Coconut, Palm, Canola, Olive, Shea Butter and Castor, Essential Oil of Lavender

Our bars are large and oversized to last, each bar is approximately 5.5 oz.  Our soap is handcrafted by the individual batch. Color will vary from batch to batch.

To make your soap last even longer be sure to store them in a well draining soap dish and away from the direct stream of water in your bath.
